desc: IrvMika TheBodyandHairChef is a hair & body care company that offers homemade products made with organic, all-natural, high- quality ingredients. We sell hair care, body care, and pet care. Our products are Sulfate-free, Paraben-free, and free of Phthalates, and are Non-Toxic, Non-GMO, Vegan, & Cruelty-free.

layout.text: High quality, all organic & natural ingredients
